com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesMouseEvents

    public class Checkbox
extends CheckboxBase<CheckBoxStyle>
implements IToggleFace<CheckBoxStyle>
    A check box is a material component that provides all the features already found in the regular GWT CheckBox Widget. A material check box can have three different faces. To set the most suitable face the setFace(CheckBoxStyle) should be used.
    • CheckBoxStyle.CHECKBOX to set the check box face
    • CheckBoxStyle.SWITCH to set the switch face
    • CheckBoxStyle.ICON to set the icon face
    Author:
    Mohamed Ilyes DIMASSI
